text: Ordered the ribs, meat was tough, bbq sauce was bland.

Not sure if the proprietor was Uncle Redd but he was a nice guy. I needed BBQ I could eat behind the wheel and he proclaimed the Pulled Pork Sandwich. He not only is friendly but he was spot on with the sandwich.  A great and fresh potato roll with a well prepared pulled pork and topped with excellent slaw. The pork was just the right tenderness and the BBQ sauce tasty with a slight kick. This place needs your support.  Eat at Uncle Redd's!!
Finally able to order something after trying for weeks, and the chicken was good. The baked beans were also flavorful.
